entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:51 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
